channel.title: New review article on powered mobility
channel.description:
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5767308/
Hi all, There are several reviews on early (birth - 5 yrs) powered mobility including a new whitepaper from RESNA. This newest review is an excellent (clear, comprehensive, well organized) overview of the theory and data on the impact of early powered (wheeled with motors) mobility on a range of 'domains' (aspects of a child's inner and outer life).

item.title: New review article on powered mobility
item.dc:creator: jacgallo
item.description:
PubMed Central (PMC)

Perspectives on Early Power Mobility Training, Motivation, and Social...

The efficacy of traditional training programs (e.g., neurodevelopmental therapy) in promoting independent mobility and early child development across all three International Classification of Functioning, Disability, and Health levels lacks rigorous...

Hi all,
There are several reviews on early (birth - 5 yrs) powered mobility including a new whitepaper from RESNA.
This newest review is an excellent (clear, comprehensive, well organized) overview of the theory and data on the impact of early powered (wheeled with motors) mobility on a range of ‘domains’ (aspects of a child’s inner and outer life).

Read full topic
